title: Warm and Fuzzy Flower Viewing
detail_text: <:th_ch0107/>Fwaaah~, it’s so beautiful zura~....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>The sakura is in full bloom, huh. Rina-chan’s board「Sparkly Eyes」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>*Munch munch*.... Eating Noppo bread under the fully blooming sakura makes it taste better than usual zura. Eat some too, Rina-chan~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Then, I’ll take the peanuts Noppo. *Munch munch*.... Rina-chan’s board「Woah~」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Fufu, Maru is glad you like it~. There are still plenty, okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Yeah.... Thank you, Hanamaru-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>You know, we had one of Kanan-chan’s strict training yesterday, Maru was really worn out, but relaxing like this with you makes my muscle pain disappear somewhere, Rina-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Strict training.... Amazing. That must be why Aqours’ dances are so amazing. I have to learn from you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Maru will tell you what kind of training plan it was. But before that.... Let’s take a nap here~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Yeah. It’s the perfect warm and fuzzy weather for a nap, after all.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
